Username firstName First name Last name Username Singleplayer Multiplayer Lives description Home PlaceholderAnswer 0 This is a placeholder question! Choose from multiple Info Expert mode Free play Time trial We are a small group of students from the Faculty of Organization and Informatics. We created this application as part of the terms of reference for the course Analysis and Program Development. The Trivia.ly app offers singleplayer and multiplayer modes. The user has the ability to play 3 singleplayer game modes: "Free play", "Time trial" and "Expert mode". Free play mode works in such a way that the user has displayed categories to select the theme of the quiz. After selecting a category, the user selects the difficulty of the quiz between the options: easy, medium and hard. The user has unlimited time to solve the quiz. The quiz ends when the user answers the question incorrectly and one life is taken away. Time trial mode works in the same way as free play mode, the only difference is that the user has limited time to solve the quiz. The game ends with an incorrect answer and the user is killed. Expert mode works in such a way that the user automatically has the selected hard quiz weight, the only thing he chooses is the category. The user has unlimited time to solve the quiz, and the quiz ends with an incorrect answer. Ovdje je tekst o multiplayer načinu igre, opisano to bit će super! Insufficient lives Final score Play again Submit Easy Medium Hard Choose difficulty Choose category Available quizes <<<<<<< HEAD
